Function to scrape housing data from a given craiglist url

Source: R/scraper.R
scraper.Rd

Function to scrape housing data from a given craiglist url

scraper(url, online = FALSE)

Arguments

url

The given Craiglist url to scrape the data from.
online

Whether the data is scraped directly from the url online (default = False). False means the data is scraped from a local HTML file.

Value

tibble A tibble containing listing information such as listing url, price, and house type

Examples

url <- "https://vancouver.craigslist.org/d/apartments-housing-for-rent/search/apa"
scraper(url = url, online = FALSE)

#> # A tibble: 120 x 3
#>    listing_url                                                price  house_type 
#>    <chr>                                                      <chr>  <chr>      
#>  1 https://vancouver.craigslist.org/bnc/apa/d/burnaby-must-s~ $1,250 1br-600ft2-
#>  2 https://vancouver.craigslist.org/rds/apa/d/surrey-bedroom~ $1,300 2br-       
#>  3 https://vancouver.craigslist.org/van/apa/d/vancouver-furn~ $1,850 1br-500ft2-
#>  4 https://vancouver.craigslist.org/van/apa/d/vancouver-yale~ $3,695 2br-900ft2-
#>  5 https://vancouver.craigslist.org/van/apa/d/vancouver-bed-~ $2,390 2br-748ft2-
#>  6 https://vancouver.craigslist.org/van/apa/d/cozy-bedroom-a~ $1,675 1br-500ft2-
#>  7 https://vancouver.craigslist.org/van/apa/d/vancouver-br-b~ $1,700 3br-       
#>  8 https://vancouver.craigslist.org/rds/apa/d/surrey-inner-n~ $950   1br-       
#>  9 https://vancouver.craigslist.org/rch/apa/d/richmond-bed-1~ $1,850 2br-1200ft~
#> 10 https://vancouver.craigslist.org/van/apa/d/vancouver-big-~ $2,600 2br-935ft2-
#> # ... with 110 more rows
